contexts.context: ...Mar is a fortified stronghold on the southeastern edge of the <mark>desolate</mark> Molag Amur region. Pilgrims bound for the nearby pilgrimage sites...
...camp, an isolated hut settlement in the middle of the <mark>desolate</mark> Molag Amur region.
...he cut through legions before facing the master himself in the <mark>desolate</mark> main hall.
